posts.post_content:
If you have a daughter into cards and memorabilia, this could be for you!

I have a full size bat 33, with 14 signatures of female players from the All American Girls Professional Baseball League.  The signatures are clear and legible.

None of the sigs are HoF's, but neat and cool none the less.

The autographs were obtained in person by myself about 6 years ago.  The players are all well into their 70's and 80's.  Two have since passed.

What I am looking for is a t206 in trade.

All I ask is that I receive a card that I do not have, and we can work out details if you are interested.

I will let you determine the value.

I can send you images as I do not have a scanner.


Lou
How fun! Best of luck on the trade.
